title: owncloud-client 1.2.1-4.1 crashes on fedora 18
body:
i've been using owncloud on fedora 17 x64 and then upgraded to  fc 18, the client is working fine but after some times it crashes, simply restarting it fixes the problem.
i was able to generate a full trace so i thought it could be useful

[andrea.soster@tyger ~]$ owncloud --logwindow
void mirall::application::setuptranslations() using "en_us" translation 
*** glibc detected *** owncloud: invalid fastbin entry (free): 0x0000000001b46e10 ***
======= backtrace: =========

/lib64/libc.so.6(clone+0x6d)[0x32c0cf246d]
